${ModID}:AuraSphere.NAME: Aura Sphere
${ModID}:AuraSphere.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Set this card's damage to !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Bifurcate.NAME: Bifurcate
${ModID}:Bifurcate.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Plant !M! {@@}{!M!|1=copy|@=copies} of a card in your hand.

${ModID}:Crystallize.NAME: Crystallize
${ModID}:Crystallize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Enemies hit lose !M! HP when attacked this turn.

${ModID}:CrystalShards.NAME: Crystal Shards
${ModID}:CrystalShards.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Druidry.NAME: Druidry
${ModID}:Druidry.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Plant a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Engrave.NAME: Engrave
${ModID}:Engrave.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards that cost 0 or more. NL Swap their costs.

${ModID}:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
${ModID}:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor for each card in your hand.

${ModID}:Etherealize.NAME: Etherealize
${ModID}:Etherealize.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Make !M! ${ModID}:Phantoms of it.

${ModID}:Exploration.NAME: Exploration
${ModID}:Exploration.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each cost 0 card drawn this way, draw an additional card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Fertilizer.NAME: Fertilizer
${ModID}:Fertilizer.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to this card's ${ModID}:Growth. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
${ModID}:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you Exhausted a card this turn, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Firestorm.NAME: Firestorm
${ModID}:Firestorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card Exhausted this turn.

${ModID}:Fissure.NAME: Fissure
${ModID}:Fissure.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Enemies with !M! or less HP left are killed.

${ModID}:Floe.NAME: Floe
${ModID}:Floe.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.{@@}

${ModID}:Flood.NAME: Flood
${ModID}:Flood.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Flood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full.

${ModID}:Forage.NAME: Forage
${ModID}:Forage.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! cards to ${ModID}:Plant. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Forage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! Upgraded cards to ${ModID}:Plant. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Geyser.NAME: Geyser
${ModID}:Geyser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw cards equal to this card's ${ModID}:Growth.

${ModID}:GraspTheArcane.NAME: Grasp the Arcane
${ModID}:GraspTheArcane.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Energy, increase the amount you gain by !M!.

${ModID}:GrassyPlain.NAME: Grassy Plain
${ModID}:GrassyPlain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Plant the next card you play this turn{@@}{!M!|>1= and ${ModID}:Grow it !M! times}.

${ModID}:Haste.NAME: Haste
${ModID}:Haste.DESCRIPTION: Make a ${ModID}:Phantom of the last non-Haste card you played this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Make a ${ModID}:Phantom of the last non-Haste card you played this combat (

${ModID}:IceWave.NAME: Ice Wave
${ModID}:IceWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Levitate.NAME: Levitate
${ModID}:Levitate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Energy, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:LivingFlame.NAME: Living Flame
${ModID}:LivingFlame.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to this card's ${ModID}:Growth. Whenever this card ${ModID}:Grows, play a copy of it.

${ModID}:ManaStorm.NAME: Mana Storm
${ModID}:ManaStorm.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with excess Energy, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}{@@} and draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s} next turn.

${ModID}:Mending.NAME: Mending
${ModID}:Mending.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Meteor.NAME: Meteor
${ModID}:Meteor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, deal equal damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Mudslide.NAME: Mudslide
${ModID}:Mudslide.DESCRIPTION: Apply Vulnerable to ALL enemies equal to this card's ${ModID}:Growth.

${ModID}:NightWatch.NAME: Night Watch
${ModID}:NightWatch.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}{@@}.

${ModID}:Nova.NAME: Nova
${ModID}:Nova.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted, put a copy of it into your hand with +1 cost and double damage.

${ModID}:Overgrowth.NAME: Overgrowth Form
${ModID}:Overgrowth.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you draw a card, ${ModID}:Grow it !M! times.
${ModID}:Overgrowth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, ${ModID}:Grow it !M! times.

${ModID}:Pitfall.NAME: Pitfall
${ModID}:Pitfall.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:PlayWithFire.NAME: Play With Fire
${ModID}:PlayWithFire.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Reflection.NAME: Reflection
${ModID}:Reflection.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain ${ModID}:Hydration equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Reforestation.NAME: Reforestation
${ModID}:Reforestation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next X{@@}{!M!|>0= + !M!} turns, ${ModID}:Plant 2 ${ModID}:Saplings. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Reforestation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Plant 2 ${ModID}:Saplings. NL At the start of your next X{@@}{!M!|>0= + !M!} turns, ${ModID}:Plant 2 ${ModID}:Saplings. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RiverOfAsh.NAME: River of Ash
${ModID}:RiverOfAsh.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted this turn, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RiverOfPeace.NAME: River of Peace
${ModID}:RiverOfPeace.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Grow them twice. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RiverOfTime.NAME: River of Time
${ModID}:RiverOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RockPolish.NAME: Rock Polish
${ModID}:RockPolish.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Whenever you play a Skill this turn, gain !${ModID}:M2! Block.

${ModID}:Rockslide.NAME: Rockslide
${ModID}:Rockslide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Crushed to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:RockSmash.NAME: Rock Smash
${ModID}:RockSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage to enemies with Block.

${ModID}:RollingFog.NAME: Rolling Fog
${ModID}:RollingFog.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Grow all cards in your hand{@@}{!M!|>1= !M! times}.

${ModID}:Sandstorm.NAME: Sandstorm
${ModID}:Sandstorm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Serenity.NAME: Serenity
${ModID}:Serenity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0.

${ModID}:Sigil.NAME: Sigil
${ModID}:Sigil.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose an Attack. NL Increase its damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Smoulder.NAME: Smoulder
${ModID}:Smoulder.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand. NL Next turn, gain [E] for each card Exhausted this way.

${ModID}:Spark.NAME: Spark
${ModID}:Spark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL Spark cards by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:SpiderLily.NAME: Spider Lily
${ModID}:SpiderLily.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP whenever you play a card this combat.

${ModID}:StealthRocks.NAME: Stealth Rocks
${ModID}:StealthRocks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of this turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to damage dealt.

${ModID}:Stranglevine.NAME: Stranglevine
${ModID}:Stranglevine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

${ModID}:SunnyDay.NAME: Sunny Day
${ModID}:SunnyDay.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Vigor for each of your ${ModID}:Planted cards.

${ModID}:TabulaRasa.NAME: Tabula Rasa
${ModID}:TabulaRasa.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a card each turn, draw cards equal to {@@}{!M!|>1=!M! times }its cost.

${ModID}:TheMountain.NAME: The Mountain
${ModID}:TheMountain.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Crushed. NL Whenever this enters your hand, lower its cost by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:ToweringOak.NAME: Towering Oak
${ModID}:ToweringOak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Growth affects this card !M! times.

${ModID}:TreeCover.NAME: Tree Cover
${ModID}:TreeCover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Tsunami.NAME: Tsunami
${ModID}:Tsunami.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard any number of cards. Gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}{@@} for each card discarded.

${ModID}:TunnelVision.NAME: Tunnel Vision
${ModID}:TunnelVision.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Discard your hand. NL Make a ${ModID}:Phantom of the chosen card for each card discarded this way.

${ModID}:Vortex.NAME: Vortex
${ModID}:Vortex.DESCRIPTION: Make a ${ModID}:Phantom of the top !M! cards in your draw pile.

${ModID}:Waterball.NAME: Waterball
${ModID}:Waterball.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this combat costed 0, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:WaterBlade.NAME: Water Blade
${ModID}:WaterBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! random cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:WaterBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! random cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Waterfall.NAME: Waterfall
${ModID}:Waterfall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted, NL gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.{@@}

${ModID}:Whirlpool.NAME: Whirlpool
${ModID}:Whirlpool.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card during your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
${ModID}:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.{@@}

${ModID}:WoodWall.NAME: Wood Wall
${ModID}:WoodWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Wormhole.NAME: Wormhole
${ModID}:Wormhole.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your draw pile, discard pile, or exhaust pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Wormhole.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your draw pile, discard pile, or exhaust pile into your hand. NL Put this card where that card was.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to swap positions with.
